author: @DavidScherfgen
text: This video explains almost nothing and misses the actual point of Grab Cut, working only with the initial rectangle. The nice thing about Grab Cut is that you can improve the segmentation result by marking certain pixels as "definitely foreground" and others as "definitely background".
